=== Requirements ===

 0. ''Availability:''
** http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/i/im-switch, available for all supported architectures
 0. ''Rationale:''
** By installing this package, input method, and conversion engine, you can use input method (XIM and IMmodule) soon without any more complicated configuration. You can also choose your favorite input method by 'im-switch' command.
 
 0. ''Security:''
** No security histroy.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
